item.title: January 2025 Recap
item.description: Here’s what I’ve been enjoying this month! Music Perverts - Ethel Cain made me feel really present in my body and in the moment I was listening to it, and I’m grateful for that. It’s inspiring me to make whatever I want to and be super unapologetic about it. I’m also looking forward to listening to her NTS.live residency episodes. Check out her Tumblr to learn more about her inspiration and process.

item.title: Hello, World
item.description: This is going to be the first post published on this new iteration of my website. Fun fact, I had initially thought I’d be using Pika for my new homepage, and I’d recommend checking it out if you want a no-friction blogging tool! However, if I was going to start writing more, I wanted to do so with complete control of where my content was hosted and how it was rendered– which meant going all-in on using Hugo (with the lovely Hugo ʕ•ᴥ•ʔ Bear Blog theme, which is inspired by another minimalist indie blogging platform, Bear Blog).

item.title: About
item.description: About Welcome to Vaida’s personal website! Personal I’m currently working out what my identity is in the present moment and in the present world, and how I can engage with the things I like in ways that make me happy. So, here’s a list of things I like: Media - whether games, music, TV, or film, as long as it makes me feel something The outside world - this blog is an attempt to simplify my digital presence and separate myself from the feed, so I can spend more time outside meeting up with friends and doing things that make me feel alive Kindness and empathy baby!
